segments.text: Are the children all grown up now , Rose ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , yes . Laura ’ s the oldest . She ’ s a computer programmer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , very interesting . And what about Rita ? She was such a bright child — always reading .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She ’ s a librarian at the public library .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? And Chris ? She was a very pretty little girl .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Christy is working as a waitress at a restaurant in Paris . She ’ s married to a French photographer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , how interesting . And what about Larry and Rocky ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Larry drives a truck . He drives all over the country . We hardly ever seen him .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? Where does he live now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And does Rocky drive a truck , too ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , no . Rocky is a pilot .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? Where does he fly ? Does he fly to other countries ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Mostly to England and France .
segments.speaker: S2
